pageContext.claim: On Federal Reserve Chair Janet L. Yellen: “I like her, I respect her. ... I do like a low-interest-rate policy, I must be honest with you.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip flop. In May 2016, Trump said he would “most likely” replace Federal Reserve Chair Janet L. Yellen. During a September 2016 general-election debate, Trump criticized Yellen and the Fed for low interest rates, implying it was politically motivated: “This Janet L. Yellen of the Fed. The Fed is doing political — by keeping the interest rates at this level.”
